byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: GENTLEMEN: I have just returned from a most interesting Celebration of our City Schools-the nnual turn-out of the children, preparatory to the Fall and Winter terns, Eleven schools, with their teachers, numbering, in the whole, about two thousand five hundred persons, assembled at I o'clock in the Capitol Park
